channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cinéma à la maison : les meilleurs vidéoprojecteurs à ultra courte focale testés pour vous
item.description: Envie d'une image de plusieurs mètres de large, mais pas envie de percer des trous dans le plafond pour installer un vidéoprojecteur ? Nous avons choisi les meilleurs modèles de vidéoprojecteurs à courte et ultra courte focale, que nous avons pu tester.

item.title: Are Elon Musk’s Mars plans finally coming back down to Earth?
item.description: Maybe you've heard, but Elon Musk is apparently a Moon fan now. He has historically been the ultimate cheerleader for human missions to Mars, and as recently as last year, he said his aim was to go straight to the red planet and that the Moon was "a distraction." Now, he has apparently changed his […]

item.title: The Boys season 5 sounds like it's going to be a bloodbath — and star Karl Urban says 'nobody is safe' from the chopping block
item.description: One of The Boys' main stars has teased potentially big character deaths in the hit Prime Video show's final season.

item.title: Le Google Pixel 10a est en précommande : faut-il craquer pour ce nouveau smartphone abordable ?
item.description: En début d'année, on est généralement habitués à voir les nouveautés smartphones du côté de Xiaomi et Samsung, mais pas forcément de Google. Et pourtant, la firme de Mountain View vient de dévoiler son nouveau Pixel 10a, un modèle toujours aussi abordable que son prédécesseur et que vous pouvez obtenir encore moins cher pendant la période de lancement. ...

item.title: As the Warner Bros. Sale Heats Up, Movie Theaters Still Don’t Trust Netflix’s Promises
item.description: Cinemark's CEO wants the streamer to prove it will keep its word on exclusivity should its Warner Bros. deal come to pass.

item.title: Perplexity Executives Think Ads Will Butcher Trust in AI
item.description: The company is scaling back its advertising efforts, according to reports.

item.title: Gabon blocks social media 'until further notice' as VPN demand soars
item.description: Gabon has blocked major social media platforms "until further notice," citing national security. Here is why VPN demand is currently up by 8,000% as residents look to stay connected.

item.title: Inégalée depuis 2017, cette fonction de l’iPhone pourrait débarquer sur les Google Pixel
item.description: Google développerait une nouvelle technologie infrarouge capable d'égaler la rapidité et la fiabilité du Face ID d'Apple.

item.title: Sharks Have Officially Reached Antarctica, and Scientists Are Shook
item.description: This marks the first time a shark has been caught on camera in these frigid waters.

item.title: Apple’s Lack of Interest in AI Hype Is Suddenly Making It Attractive to Wall Street
item.description: Apple has positioned itself as an alternative to tech stocks dependent on the AI boom to grow.

item.title: 'We want to help' — Mullvad VPN offers server support to privacy-first GrapheneOS
item.description: After GrapheneOS revealed it lacked high-bandwidth European servers, Mullvad publicly offered sponsorship. While no formal partnership has been confirmed, the move highlights growing collaboration within the privacy ecosystem.

item.title: Audible syncs ebook reading and audiobook listening to keep you focused
item.description: On Wednesday, Audible launched a new "immersion reading" feature that could help readers concentrate on their audiobooks by allowing them to read along with the ebook version. While listening to an audiobook in the Audible app, users can tap the "Read & Listen" button above their book's cover art to see the text version of […]

item.title: AI just made my favorite Skullcandy earbuds worse — and I’m not sure anyone asked for it
item.description: The Skullcandy Method 540 ANC are incredibly similar to their predecessor. The only change is a higher price and optional AI assistant, and it's hard to believe anybody wanted either of these updates.

item.title: Currys launches a new Epic deals sale — I've found the 13 best deals on TVs, appliances, headphones, and more with up to 30% off
item.description: Currys has launched another of its Epic Deals sales events this week, with savings of up to 30% available across TVs, appliances, headphones, and more top tech — I've picked out the 13 best deals.

item.title: Spotify debuts SeatGeek integration for concert ticket sales
item.description: Ticketing marketplace SeatGeek has announced a partnership with Spotify that will direct an artist's fans to its platform from the Spotify app. The integration is currently limited to a few participating venues for which SeatGeek is the primary ticket seller. While SeatGeek is one of the largest online marketplaces for the secondary ticketing market, the company's announcement makes clear that this Spotify integration only applies to venues where it's the primary ticketing company. For now, that's just 15 US partner venues, primarily professional sports arenas like AT&T Stadium in Arlington, T...

item.title: Cette endurante montre connectée avec plus de 20 jours d’autonomie est enfin à moitié prix
item.description: Loin derrière les prix des Garmin, Polar et autres montres sportives premium, l'Amazfit Balance 2 nous avait bluffés lors de notre test l'année dernière. Alors, quand on la trouve à 155 euros au lieu de 299 euros, c'est clairement une affaire à ne pas louper !

item.title: Audible’s new ‘Read & Listen’ feature syncs your Kindle ebooks with audiobooks
item.description: The feature will require customers to buy both versions of the title, but at a discounted price.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs vidéoprojecteurs en 2026 ? Notre sélection
item.description: Même si les TV sont de plus en plus grandes, le meilleur moyen de reproduire une expérience cinéma chez soi reste d'utiliser un projecteur. Découvrez notre sélection des meilleurs vidéoprojecteurs testés par Frandroid.

item.title: « Un grand nombre de faillites » : la RAMpocalypse va provoquer un carnage dans l’électronique grand public
item.description: Ça s'annonce mal pour bon nombre d'acteurs de l'industrie de la tech qui n'ont pas les poches profondes des mastodontes du secteur. La crise de la RAM pourrait en effet déboucher sur la disparition pure et simple de plusieurs entreprises et ce, dès la fin de cette année selon un des plus grands spécialistes mondiaux de la mémoire.

item.title: X continues to bet on vertical video with its latest update
item.description: X's new immersive video player is designed to offer a more mobile-friendly experience, optimized especially for portrait-oriented videos.

item.title: The first 4K TV recorder box with Freely streaming built in is here — is it the ultimate way to watch things any time you want?
item.description: The Humax Aura EZ can record multiple channels of live TV via an aerial, and has Freely streaming too

item.title: This 'exceptionally well-balanced' Windows 11 mini PC is perfect for creators and business — GMKtec’s compact workstation gets a $109 price cut
item.description: The GMKtec Nucbox K8 Plus mini PC delivers fast everyday performance in a compact, space-saving design, and it’s $109 off.

item.description: The Alexa-enabled smoke detector is Kidde’s second model in collaboration with Ring—no wires required.

item.title: Top Abu Dhabi finance summit exposes personal data, passport info of hundreds of major global figures
item.description: Around 700 attendees had their passports and ID card scans leaked, but it appears the leak was plugged on time.

item.title: I used AI to find the right perfume for my wife and I don’t regret it
item.description: Gooel Gemini is surprisingly adept at helping you pull an excellent Valentine's Day gift out of a proverbial hat.

item.title: Burnt Hair and Soft Power: A Night Out With Evie Magazine
item.description: Evie is a longtime favorite of far-right. At its very first live event, the strength of the publication's politics was in the pretense that it doesn’t have any.

item.title: Google’s AI music maker is coming to the Gemini app
item.description: Google has given Gemini the ability to spit out AI-generated music, courtesy of DeepMind's latest audio model. Beta access to Lyria 3 is rolling out in the Gemini app, enabling users to generate 30-second tracks based on text, images, and videos, without having to leave the chatbot window. The new music-making tool is available globally […]

item.title: Snapchat+ tops 25M subscribers, driving company’s direct revenue ARR to $1B
item.description: The revenue milestone comes as Snap has added additional paid offerings outside of its core Snapchat+ subscription over the past year to diversify its revenue streams.

item.title: Google adds music-generation capabilities to the Gemini app
item.description: Users will be able to use text, images, and videos as a reference to generate music.

item.title: ‘We are always going to have The Walsh Sisters’: how BBC iPlayer’s emotional new Marian Keyes adaptation turned its cast into a real family
item.description: The Walsh Sisters hits BBC One and BBC iPlayer on February 21 — and this Marian Keyes adaptation has deeper roots than meets the eye.

item.title: When accurate AI is still dangerously incomplete
item.description: Typically, when building, training and deploying AI, enterprises prioritize accuracy. And that, no doubt, is important; but in highly complex, nuanced industries like law, accuracy alone isn’t enough. Higher stakes mean higher standards: Models outputs must be assessed for relevancy, authority, citation accuracy and hallucination rates. To tackle this immense task, LexisNexis has evolved beyond standard retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to graph RAG and agentic graphs; it has also built out "planner" and "reflection" AI agents that parse requests and criticize their own outputs. “There’s no...

item.title: X’s Algorithm Pushes Users to Lean More Conservative, Researchers Find
item.description: The algorithm also doesn't like posts by traditional news media, the researchers found.

item.title: Google Gemini frappe fort : voici Lyria, le Nano Bannana de la musique
item.description: Google lance une nouvelle fonction majeure pour Gemini. Après le texte et l'image, Gemini peut générer de la musique avec Lyria.

item.title: J’ai généré 5 musiques avec Gemini : la nouvelle fonction Lyria impressionne déjà malgré les limites
item.description: Google Gemini sait désormais gérer de la musique grâce à l'intégration de l'outil Lyria 3. Voici ce que ça donne.

item.title: Google Pixel 10A preorders come with a $100 gift card

We already published a hands-on with the device, and I encourage you to check it out (we think it’s more like a better Pixel 9A than a slightly worse Pixel 10). If you decide that you want to […]

item.title: Après le solaire, l’automobile ? Ce rapport officiel met en garde contre un crash industriel de l’Europe face à la Chine
item.description: Dans un rapport intitulé "l'industrie européenne face au rouleau compresseur chinois", la France revient sur un épisode douloureux des années 2010. Quand la Chine est devenue maitresse des panneaux solaires, loin devant l'Europe, pourtant à la pointe sur le sujet au début des années 2000. Un épisode qui pourrait se reproduire dans le domaine automobile. ...

item.title: Cette référence des VAE, notée 9/10 et proposée avec 1 000 € de réduction, séduit toujours autant avec sa transmission automatique
item.description: Le modèle BTWIN LD 920 E est un vélo électrique de grande qualité qui brille par sa transmission automatique très agréable et sa tenue de route exemplaire, à retrouver aujourd'hui pour 1 999,99 euros au lieu de 2 999,99 euros chez Decathlon.

item.title: Waymo denies using remote drivers after Senate testimony goes viral
item.description: Waymo defended its use of remote assistants for its robotaxis after the testimony of one of its top executives during a Senate hearing went viral. In a letter to Sen. Ed Markey (D-MA) on Tuesday, Waymo's head of global operations Ryan McNamara provided a detailed description of the company's remote assistance operations, including the number […]

item.title: Nevada sues to block Kalshi’s prediction betting market
item.description: Nevada is suing to block the prediction market platform Kalshi from allowing residents to place bets on the outcomes of events, including elections and sports games, as reported earlier by Business Insider. The lawsuit adds to a growing number of legal battles across the country, claiming that Kalshi is harming the state's gambling market by […]

item.title: 'Consumers are far outstripping enterprise for the moment, but we expect enterprise will surely and slowly get on that bandwagon': Palo Alto CEO says adoption of AI is still an ongoing process for many firms
item.description: Palo Alto isn't worried about slower enterprise AI adoption compared with consumers – after all, it was the same with cloud adoption.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures berlines électriques à acheter en 2026 ?
item.description: Bien que peu populaire, la berline est une voiture polyvalente. Elle s'adapte aux familles, à la ville ou aux déplacements plus longs. Nous avons sélectionné les meilleures berlines électriques que nous avons testées.

item.title: Google officially unveils Pixel 10a with completely flat backside
item.description: Google Pixel 10a made its big debut on Wednesday, bringing a camera bar that's totally flush with the phone's rear.

item.title: « Qui va fabriquer les batteries des voitures européennes ? » : le géant français gèle ses usines et lance un appel à l’aide
item.description: Pris en étau entre des coûts qui explosent et un marché qui ralentit, le fabricant de batteries ACC tire la sonnette d'alarme. Yan Vincent, son patron, prévient : sans chèque massif de l'Europe, l'avenir industriel s'écrit en pointillés.

item.title: Big Tech Says Generative AI Will Save the Planet. It Doesn’t Offer Much Proof
item.description: A new report finds that of 154 specific claims about how AI will benefit the climate, just a quarter cited academic research. A third included no evidence at all.

item.title: 'Absurd GPU pricing update': new report shows painful reality of graphics card price hikes, particularly for Nvidia models
item.description: If you needed any confirmation that GPUs are getting a lot more expensive, these stats make it painfully clear.

item.title: These 6 quotes from OpenClaw creator Peter Steinberger hint at the future of personal computing
item.description: The Austrian developer created a massively successful AI agent platform, which he has agreed to sell to OpenAI. The AI boom began with ChatGPT and chatbots. Now chatbots are starting to “grow arms and legs,” as developers say, meaning they can use digital tools and work independently on a human’s behalf. The open-source platform OpenClaw is notable because it lets people build agents with far more autonomy than those offered by big tech....

item.title: PS5 : face à l’explosion du prix de la mémoire, Sony veut vous faire dépenser plus d’argent
item.description: Même si PlayStation 5 continue de se vendre par palettes, Sony doit faire face à un ennemi invisible mais redoutable : la flambée des prix de la mémoire. Pour compenser ces coûts de fabrication qui grimpent, le constructeur japonais a une stratégie bien rodée. Plutôt que de toucher au prix de la console, l'objectif est désormais de vous faire consommer plus de jeux et de services. ...

item.title: Comparatif 2026 : on a testé les enceintes Bluetooth les plus abordables du moment
item.description: Envie de profiter d’un bon son sans vous ruiner ? Bienvenur sur notre sélection des meilleures enceintes Bluetooth à moins de 100 euros : des modèles abordables, robustes et faciles à transporter, pour combler votre budget comme vos oreilles.
